mapper.insert: insert into notice_type (id, name, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update notice_type set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from notice_type where del_flg = 0
select id, name, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from notice_type where del_flg=0
select count(1) from notice_type where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from notice_type where del_flg=0
